name: Fake News
description:
FAKE NEWS is a video game that I made in 3 days for the Ben Bonk game jam where
the theme was trust no one

The Theme:
  Lots of people were asking me about how the game doesn't fit the theme of the jam.
  The Theme was trust no one and in this game its about not being able to trust you
  (Trump) because your spreading fake news to win the election

Description:
  You play as Trump and half to spread fake news to turn people to your side
  You get 5 minutes to win the election.

Controls:
  A and D to move
  Use mouse to aim and left/right click to shoot
  M to go to main menu
  (more in depth tutorial is in the game)
